name: TheHive
description: This app integrates with an instance of TheHive to perform ticketing actions

base_url.description: Device URL to connect to including the port

actions.description: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity using supplied configuration

actions.verbose: If the owner mentioned in the input parameter is an invalid user and it does not exist on The Hive platform, the ticket will get successfully created but, the owner displayed on the UI of The Hive will be ***unknown*** as per the API behavior. The user can update the same ticket by running the action Update Ticket with a valid user in the owner field.

severity.description: Severity of the case (default is Medium)

owner.description: User to whom the case has been assigned (default is the user who created the case)

example_values: Invalid severity entered. Must be one of: Low, Medium, or High.
Invalid TLP entered. Must be one of: White, Green, Amber, or Red.

actions.verbose: If the JSON containing fields is having invalid field names or invalid field values to update, then, none of the fields get updated and the action passes successfully.

example_values: The Waiting is the Hardest Part
The Waiting is the Hardest Part

actions.verbose:
For example, {"query": {"_in": {"_field": "title", "_values": ["bill"]}}}
Note: "_values" field should be in lowercase only.

For example, {"query": {"_in": {"_field": "title", "_values": ["bill"]}}}
Note: "_values" field should be in lowercase only.

example_values: This is for testing update task for InProgress status
Sorry folks, park's closed. Moose out front shoulda told ya

actions.description: Creates an observable for the specified case
actions.verbose: If a file is to be attached to this observable, the 'vault_id' parameter must be used.

data_type.description: Data type of the observable (select one from list)

data.description: Value of the data for this observable

tags.description: Tags to associate with this observable (can be a comma-separated list)

description.description: Describe the observable in the context of the case

vault_id.description: Vault ID for the file to be attached. Ignored if not 'file' data_type

ioc.description: Indicates if this observable is an IOC

actions.description: Retrieve observables associated with a case

ticket_id.description: Ticket ID to retrieve observables from

data_type.description: Limit the results by observable type

example_values: This is expected activity. Closing Task
This is expected activity. Closing Task
